Articles.Content:
Opinions vary.

The user below me built their own PC.

What is a PC...I only understand the language from the cult of the bitten fruit...

TUBM games on a mac...if you don't then we can't be friends
I do. Lol. TUBM Doesnt game on a mac.

Not much anymore.

The user below,me loves battleships

I'm more interested the way they operate internally. I need to get hold of one of those analogue consoles!

You know very well how that would end, don't you...
I think the real,question is, do,we want to know.
The user below me likes X-Com

Haven't played it. But I have played (and thoroughly enjoyed) Xenonauts. Yes, I did watch Scott Manley.

TUBM Also watches Mr. Manley.

YES

The user below me is an introvert.

Yup, but not shy.

TUBM took the 16 personalities test.

Nope, do you have a link?

TUBM watches Tyler Raiz on YouTube

Who's that?

The person below me is working on a genealogy project for school.

Nope

TUBM is new

Technically not at all.

Tubm is old enough to drink legally

Depends on where you're from. Where I am, there's no permitted age. You drink when you feel you're ready, and surprisingly, the people here, albeit very few, are very responsible with it.

Bet you can't say the same thing.

I'm in law school. The people here better be responsible when they drink.

Oh, who am I kidding? I managed to give myself a wicked hangover on the day I fly back from a school-sponsored trip!

TUBM is suffering through some post-graduate or professional course.

I can't. Drinking age is.... wait, none? We can jsut buy alco after 18. Oh, good, so i wasnt doing crimes all that time.

TUBM is from a scandinavian country.

EDIT: I was typing this post so long that i got ninja'd 5 minutes later, wut.

Im not suffering, i think.

Opposite hemispheare

TUBM has done a TUBM on me before

No.

The user below me has arthritis.

(I had it at age 4)

Nope.avi

The user below me has solved a Rubik's cube(Without taking it apart of course)
No, always hated those things. TUBM dislikes liberal arts.

Don't even know what that is.

The user below me has his/her career bottlenecked because of age.

I... dont have a career. No. I dont think ill have one in a few years actually.

TUBM is a kerbal.

I'm not..or am I? We will never know the answer....

TUBM has done Karate in the past

BadS = true

Wouldn't you agree?

EDIT: MyS = Ninja'd
